metadata.synopsis: After the player asks to participate in the Mage Hand kids' game, they get shoved and told that they lost and the game is over.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to 1314; -2; -806 in CRE_Main_A and talk to the kids playing with Mage Hands.Tell them that you want to join.The kid will shove you with her Mage Hand and then deliver the line.

0.speaker: Zel'i
0.text: You lose, k'chakhi! Go play by yourself.
